title: What if I dreamed that I gave birth to a daughter according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl Seeing the birth of females in a dream is one of the visions that promise goodness and happiness for the Lord, and many are always looking for an interpretation of this vision, so the great scholars of interpretation interpreted it according to the state of the deity, and it was also interpreted for each of the unmarried girl, the married girl, the pregnant girl, the divorced girl and others. I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl When a woman sees that she gave birth to a girl in her dream, this indicates the end of all the worries and troubles that the woman suffered in her life and enjoying a life full of goodness and happiness in the coming period. But for a divorced woman to see that she gave birth to a girl in her dream is one of the good visions for her because it brings her happiness and joy in her coming life. When a married woman sees in her dream that she gave birth to a sick female, this vision is considered one of the bad dreams because it leads to the presence of some worries and problems that the afflicted person suffers from in his life soon. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the vision of children in a dream as an indication that the dreamer suffers from some problems and difficulties in her life, if she gave birth to a boy, but if she sees that she gives birth to a girl. This leads in her dream to the dreamer obtaining more goodness and blessings, in addition to improving her circumstances in general, in the coming period. I dreamed that I gave birth to a daughter by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of the birth of a girl in a dream as good news for expanding livelihoods and earnings, and if a woman sees that she gave birth to a beautiful brown girl, this means that she will enjoy a life full of peace and stability, but watching the birth of a girl with thick and soft hair leads to an increase in goodness and blessings in her life, and God knows best. I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl and I am single The dream that I gave birth to a girl when I was single was interpreted with many different interpretations and associations. Watching the birth of a girl in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that her marriage to a young man with many good qualities is approaching. Seeing the birth of females in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the dreamer's religiosity and righteousness. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a female, this means that she will get rid of all the problems and pains that have plagued her for a long time, God willing. I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl and I am married. It is known that seeing a woman giving birth in a married woman's dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that bring her goodness and confidence in her life. Senior scholars of interpretation have interpreted this vision. Seeing a married woman give birth to a girl in her dream means that she will enjoy a happy married life without problems, and when a woman sees a married woman saying that she gave birth to a girl, so this can be evidence of that. The closest date of her pregnancy, God knows best, and the birth of a girl in a married woman's dream is the best evidence that God will bless her with righteous offspring, God knows best. I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl and I am pregnant When a pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth to a girl, this means that she will give birth naturally, God willing, if she is in her last months, and seeing the birth of a girl in a pregnant woman's dream can be an indication that her fetus is

title: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing a silver gift in a dream

preview.html: I dream of a silver gift in a dream and its interpretation. Of course, gifts are an entrance into the souls of many people, as they carry with them feelings of love and affection and eliminate differences or problems between the two parties, but silver gifts have a special impact on the hearts of many girls, especially if it is a delicate necklace or ring that is presented in a dream. A happy occasion, such as an engagement, engagement, or wedding anniversary, but some may see a silver gift in a dream whether it was given by a lover or husband, or given by some friends. On a birthday, follow us to find out the interpretation of this in detail in the following lines. A silver gift in a dream: Seeing silver in a dream is generally considered an indication of saving money. If one is going through financial difficulties and sees that he has discovered a large amount of silver jewelry in his home, this indicates withdrawing some amounts for which he has been saving for several years to get rid of it - anxiety. Meaning of a silver dreamAnd if the visionary works in a job and receives his salary in the form of silver coins This indicates the creation of huge wealth later, and if he is a student, this means that he held prestigious positions or obtained a scholarship in a foreign country. If the gift is utensils or cups in which the visionary person eats food, then this indicates moving to a new home or A trip to some foreign country and to a large extent to a dignified and luxurious life. You have a dream that confuses you and that you are waiting for.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. A silver gift in a dream for a married man. If this gift is not original or imitation, it indicates deception or interference in the marriage if it is He is on the verge of marriage, as he feels very sad, and if he is already married, this means that he faces many problems that will make him break up with her. His wife and reconnection. Seeing a silver gift in a dream for a married woman. If she is married and pregnant, this means that she will give birth to a healthy child, and if she has not given birth yet, this indicates that pregnancy will occur soon. Conversely, if the gift is an imitation or has a false sheen, it indicates a connection A false person who claims money, but is not eligible for marriage, and if she is married, this indicates an increase in the seriousness of problems. Between her and her husband at this time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Sources: - Quotation based on: 1- Book of Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, research Basil Breidi, Al -. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 3- The Book of Signs in the World of Expressions, Imam al-Mu’bar, Ghars al-Din Khalil bin Shaheen al-Zahiri, researched by Sayyid Kasrawi Hassan, Dar al-Kutub, Scientific Edition. Beirut 1993.

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about sharing from someone I know

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an engagement from someone I know: Engagement is one of the things that fills the heart and soul with joy and happiness. As for seeing an engagement in a dream for a married woman, does the vision mean kindness or are there other meanings behind this dream? In the following lines, he will explain all the details and indicators so that the dreamer’s heart is at peace. Interpretation of a dream about engagement from someone I know. Dreaming about engaging someone you know means that the dreamer has many ideas and plans that he wants to implement in order to reach satisfactory results related to her professional life. Interpretation of a dream about engagement from someone I know With Ibn Sirin, the great scholar Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer sees that she is engaged to someone she knows in the dream, this is evidence of great help to her family and that she is a responsible person who bears a lot with her family. From financial pressures. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing the engagement of someone I know in the dreamer’s dream indicates that the dreamer will receive many largely happy events in the coming days. The scholar Ibn Sirin also said that seeing a girl’s engagement to someone she knows during sleep indicates changes. The radical dream that will happen in the life of the dreamer will satisfy her greatly. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about engagement in a dream by Ibn Shahini. It explains the interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream. That the dreamer has accomplished many things that are of great importance to him. Ibn Shaheen also said that the dreamer’s dream of her engagement to an unknown person in her dream indicates that she will reach a great position in her professional life in the coming days. Ibn Shaheen interpreted and said that the dream of a handsome young man’s engagement in The dreamer's dream indicates that this person will actually propose to her in the next few days, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about engagement from someone I know for single women. An unmarried woman dreams of someone she knows proposing to her in the dream. This is a sign that the dreamer will have moments of joy that will put her in a state of fun in The coming periods. While interpretation scholars said that if the dreamer sees during her sleep that the person who proposed to her is a university teacher, this is a sign of superiority and that the dreamer will acquire a great degree of knowledge during this year. But if an unmarried woman sees that the person who proposed to her in her dream is her boss, this indicates that she will get a big promotion that she has wanted for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about engagement by someone I do not know for single people. An unmarried woman dreamed during her sleep that someone she did not know had Get engaged in a dream, this is a sign that she will hear a lot of good news about her personal life in the coming periods. Seeing the engagement of someone I do not know in the dreamer’s dream is an indication of the approaching date of her marriage, by a person with a respectable position in society and a religious young man, and God will be considered in her. . Interpretation experts also interpreted and said that an unmarried woman who dreams of getting engaged to someone she does not know in her dream shows that she is a strong and responsible person in dealings.

title: Meanings of dreaming about sweeping in a dream in all its forms

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a broom in a dreamMost dream books interpret a broom as a symbol of spiritual cleansing and getting rid of old problems, but the exact meaning of the dream depends on its details, the interaction of the person in the dream, as well as the person who had the dream. An old broom is a sign of major problems and difficulties in the financial plan, while A new broom is good for all spheres of life and a vacuum cleaner also symbolizes good health and well-being. Serious financial difficulties are expected in the near future, the dreamer will need to urgently pay off his debts or pay a large purchase price. And if you took a broom from the dreamer in a dream, then the broom is returned to him This promises promotion, and some interpreters interpret their vision as a change in life for the better, and these changes will occur to the dreamer. He buys a broom. And if someone dreams of a broom, it means that he is tired of routine and monotony, and that the dreamer wants to have new and lively sensations with his other half. Since he will be able to fulfill his desire, seeing a broom in the corner of the bedroom is a sign that the dreamer Very modest and shy, he does not like to talk about his fantasies, and therefore his life is boring and monotonous. If it happens that you throw a broom in a dream, this means that someone is tired of the dreamer and wants to stop all communication with a person who upsets his mood every day, but for some reason does not He can do it with him. Sweeping symbol in a dream A new broom in the house can portend a serious illness or dismissal from work, especially if the dreamer was born in the winter, but if he was born at any other time of the year, success can be expected in all matters and in Personal life. For girls, such a dream promises an increase in household chores in the coming period, and the meaning of the dream increases if the broom was purchased recently. Seeing an unclean broom is a business trip to a distant country. A large broom indicates that the person cannot solve the problem that worries him with any In a way, a small broom means that the dreamer takes everything very close to his heart. A broom that stands with its handle down promises unexpected profits, and if the handle is raised, the dream warns the person that now is not the best time to create your own business. You should also pay attention to The exact location and location of the broom is explained as follows:If it is in the hands of a stranger, it means meeting an interesting person. Its place was in the corner of the room, this indicates a conflict within the family. In the closet indicates the emergence of secrets from relatives of the owners of the house. The presence of a broom In the store means buying large and valuable things for the home. Interpretation of situations of sweeping in a dream The correct interpretation of a dream about a broom depends on how the dreamer interacts with it and the state of the dream itself and its shape as follows: Hold a broom with your hands and sweep the floorIn most dream books, this is interpreted as an auspicious and good sign that promises improvement Great financial situation and achieving the set goal or receiving help from a stranger. If the place that the dreamer sweeps is unclean, then the

title: Interpretation of beets in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Beets in a dream. Beets are a type of jewelry for women. They are also called gold bracelets. Many people love them and love to wear and adorn them. They have many shapes and types. When a woman sees bracelets in her dream, she is surprised, or perhaps she is happy with them. Interpretation scholars believe that the interpretation The vision varies depending on the social status of the fortuneteller and what happened in the dream, whether he bought, sold, destroyed or stole, and in this article we report the following: Consider together the most important thing that the jurists said about this dream. The beets in the dreams The distinguished scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a married woman carrying golden beets In a dream, it indicates great difficulties and problems in her life with her husband. If the dreamer sees that she is selling beets in a dream, this means that she will hear a lot of sad news and events, which will make her fall into a crisis of sadness and depression. And when the dreamer sees that her tubs have been stolen, this means that she She is characterized by efficiency, courage, and strength and strives to achieve her goals. As for an unmarried girl who dreams that someone gives her beetles, this means that her desires and ambitions will be fulfilled. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is wearing golden beets, this means that she will give birth to a male child, and God knows best. And if a man sees That he is wearing beer shoes in a dream, it means that he is feeling upset because of a financial crisis that he is suffering from or that he is uncomfortable in his job. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Bananas in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin sees golden beetles In a man’s dream, it means that he will be subjected to sorrow and exhausting worries, and these are unpleasant visions. A married woman who sees in a dream that she is wearing golden hats means that she will enjoy a lot of kindness and livelihood. Seeing a lighthouse in a dream means that the dreamer is known for his good reputation, and that he does good deeds. He is walking on the straight path. When the sleeper sees beets in a dream, and there is one beet, it symbolizes the great inheritance that you will obtain, and if there are two, this indicates a bad reputation and people say inappropriate words about it. But if the dreamer sees that a man of authority has... He gave him golden beets, which means that he will receive abundant sustenance and the doors of kindness will open for him. Beets in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who dreams of wearing golden hats means that she is known for her strength and courage and has the ability to take full responsibility and manage her affairs. Also, if the girl sees that someone He gives her golden beets in a dream, this means that she will fulfill many desires and hopes that she has dreamed of for a long time. And if the dreamer sees that he is taking beets from someone he knows, then he promises her that she will marry him soon. And for a girl, if she sees a man giving her beets, and she is broken, this means that he will deceive her He conspires against her or that she will enter into an emotional relationship that is not good and will end. And when the dreamer sees that her fruits have been stolen, this means that she will lose many valuable things in her life or...

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream?

preview.html: Hadouta website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream. Seals are known to be a type of animal that lives in the sea, which is also called sea lion. Also, seeing a seal or a sea lion in a dream is one of the dreams of many people, so we have provided for you, dear followers, all the meanings and evidence so that you know what the interpretation of a black seal in a dream is and what it has. the meaning. It is one of the books of distinguished scholars in interpreting dreams and visions. What is the interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream in its entirety according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a black seal in a dream filled with Ibn Sirin is evidence of important projects that the dreamer wants to achieve. Seeing a seal in a dream also indicates the pursuit of success And achieving many desires and goals. The interpretation of seeing a white seal in a dream indicates that the dreamer will receive help from some people. Seeing a seal in a dream is full of good dreams that indicate goodness and harvesting livelihood. What is the complete interpretation of seeing a sea lion in a dream? It indicates overcoming the problems and problems that the dreamer was facing. The death of a seal in a dream is an unwanted vision that indicates bad luck, destruction, and sadness. The interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream is complete for a general woman. The dream interpretation of a seal attack in a complete dream for a woman indicates that there are some enemies and people who hate her Seeing a seal attacking another animal in a dream for a girl indicates envy and hatred on the part of friends. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing Deep, whether it was for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, with its various meanings. Today, through the seeing Deep website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing Deep in a dream based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al. - Al-Nabulsi or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A dream about a wolf in a dream indicates a fraudster who persecutes people and is also called a liar. Seeing a wolf in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have a new baby in his house whose lineage extends to the criminal’s clan. Seeing a wolf in a dream is interpreted. As good and beautiful words and good news. Seeing a wolf hunting in a dream symbolizes the joy, bliss and happiness that overwhelms God. Dreaming of a musician who turns into a wolf symbolizes his great benefit. Dreaming of a wolf meeting a dog in a dream portends deception and deception that surrounds the scenes around him. Seeing a wolf in a dream indicates the presence of a deceitful man in her life, and the use of inappropriate methods to reach her. A dream about a wolf in a dream for a single woman indicates... Deception, deception, and false feelings and must be removed immediately. A dream about a wolf being hunted by a married woman indicates the bad deeds she has committed and she is afraid of the words of the people around her. She tried to defend herself and killed him, as she stated that she She will get rid of all her worries and problems. Seeing a wolf in a dream for a divorced woman. title: What is the interpretation of eating red watermelon in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating red watermelon? Watermelon is considered one of the foods that many love. It has a distinctive and different taste and is often eaten in the summer because it gives a feeling of refreshment. Some may see it in their dreams in many different forms, which differ in meaning from one. One person to another according to its condition or its shape in the dream, whether we cut it, ate it, or bought it, and through the following lines we will learn about the most famous interpretations that were reported about seeing it in one dream. Interpretation of eating red watermelon in a dream for a single woman: If she sees that she is eating it, but it tastes spoiled or not good, It is an indication of some diseases and exposure to health crises in reality, especially if you eat in large quantities. But if she sees that she ate it and it tasted good and wonderful, and she felt that it was delicious and she ate a lot, then this is happy news that will happen in her life, or perhaps a harbinger of engagement or marriage. In the near future, from a well-off young man. Eating red watermelon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees in a dream eating red watermelon as evidence of his ability to solve many of the problems he faced in his life and will be more comfortable in his life. If one sees himself eating a watermelon Red in his dream, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money from his work which will bring great prosperity in the coming days. If the dreamer sees himself eating a red watermelon during his sleep, this represents the good news that will soon reach his ears and spread great joy and happiness around him. Seeing the dreamer in a dream eating red watermelon symbolizes positive changes that will occur in many aspects of his life, which will be very satisfying for him. If one sees himself eating red watermelon in his dream, this is a sign that he will achieve many things that he has dreamed of for a long time and this will make him In a state of great happiness. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a watermelon: When you cut it with a knife and then eat it immediately, this heralds the marriage of the man she wanted in her life. Many interpretation scholars said: His approval in one dream, because it indicates goodness and goodness, and the fulfillment of long-awaited desires and dreams. If she sees that someone gave her a piece of it and she ate it, this means that she benefits from it, perhaps money or work, and this indicates ownership of the property, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of buying red watermelon in a dream for a single woman. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for a website. Egyptian interpretation of dreams. When a girl sees that she desires it and buys it from the market, this is evidence of the completion of some things that she has been putting off for a long time, and it is one of the things that brings her goodness and justice. Some scholars said that when she desires and buys it in her dream, it is a sign of marriage. In the near future, God willing. Eating yellow watermelon in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream eating yellow watermelon means that she will receive a marriage proposal from a person who suits her well and she will agree to it immediately and will be very happy in her life with him. If the dreamer sees herself eating yellow watermelon

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of betrayal?

preview.html: Betrayal is the most difficult feeling that any person experiences, and seeing betrayal in a dream is an annoying dream, and the dreamers begin to search for the most important connotations that this dream carries, so today we will refer to the interpretation of the dream of betrayal for the single, married, pregnant, and male in detail based on the statements of the interpreters, especially Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal. Interpretation of dreams about betrayal is an indication that the dreamer is characterized by a set of bad qualities in addition to being constantly dissatisfied with his life and comparing it to the lives of others. To him without any problem, in the event that he sees that the dreamer has vengeful desires against the person who betrayed him, it is an indication of the outbreak of many disputes and problems in the coming period. Betrayal in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer has negative energy inside that he wants to discharge. Ibn Shaheen said: If I saw betrayal by a person whom the dreamer knows in reality and whose relationship with him was strong, the dream indicates that the heart of this person is good and pure and does not hold any hatred towards the dreamer or in this. Betrayal in the dream of a person who holds a high position is a sign that he is always afraid of Losing this position.Interpretation of a dream about betrayal by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer betraying himself in a dream is a sign that negative thoughts dominate his head and that he is constantly worried about the future and what it hides. For everyone around him, even if their intentions are clear towards him, betrayal takes many forms, so seeing betrayal in a dream usually symbolizes that the viewer is being robbed or betrayed by someone very close to him at the moment. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing betrayal in The dream leads to a financial crisis and the accumulation of debts, and the dreamer stands in front of it motionless, unable to do anything. The dream also symbolizes that crises will follow in the dreamer’s life and he will feel anxious and upset for a long time. The dream of betrayal is a sign that the dreamer is exposed to serious conflicts with love and it is important to be sensible so as not to lose control of matters. Betrayal of a dreaming patient is a sign of restoring health and well-being. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of an unmarried womanBetrayal in one dream is a sign that life will go through many difficult ordeals and she must deal with them rationally, from which she will be attracted to her and show feelings of love even though she has malicious intentions inside her. And it is important to watch out for it. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing betrayal in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that he will be able to reveal the truth to everyone around her in the coming days, and he is also able to remove harmful people from his life without any hesitation. The desire to marry the person she loves, but she is afraid that he will betray her. Interpretation of a dream of betrayal by a married woman: The dream of betrayal in a married woman’s dream indicates that her husband has had multiple sexual relations with women, and although she doubts him at the moment, the next few days will send her many From concrete evidence. Religiously, if the dreamer sees that the husband is cheating on her with her sister, then the dream indicates that in reality she harbors hatred and hatred towards her sister.If
